sentences.sentence: I realize now I was submerging all my problems in the Beatles.
sentences.translation: 现在我意识到我把自己所有的问题都淹没到披头士中了。

sentences.sentence: One of the proven processes involves partially dismantling the aircraft and submerging the pieces in tanks of a special solution through which a mild electric current is passed.
sentences.translation: 对行之有效的进程之一涉及拆除的部分飞机和淹没在一个特别温和的解决方案，通过它的电流是通过坦克的碎片。

sentences.sentence: I watched a school whales gradually submerging.
sentences.translation: 我看着鲸群慢慢潜入水中。
